English: I've been looking for you everywhere.

French: Il n'y a pas de réponse.

English: It's the beginning of the year.
I want to see the movie.
I want to watch the film.
I want to watch this film.

French: Il n'y a pas de garde.

English: There is no such thing as {{c::coincidence}}.
